title: NSheetProps
description: Neuron sheet component for slide-out panel overlays. Slides in from any edge of the screen to display supplementary content.

title.description: Title text displayed in the sheet header.

description.description: Description text displayed below the title.

side.description: Edge of the screen from which the sheet slides in.

open.description: Whether the sheet is open (controlled mode).

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
